sentence: The image features a series of stone sculptures shaped like giant human hands emerging from a grassy hillside.
sentence_cn: 该图片展示了一系列石雕，形状如同巨大的人手从长满青草的山坡上伸出。

sentence: These hands are arranged in a circular formation reminiscent of Stonehenge.
sentence_cn: 这些手排列成一个圆形，让人联想到巨石阵。

sentence: In the center, one of the hands holds a flip phone with the AT&T logo prominently displayed on its screen.
sentence_cn: 在中心，一只手拿着一部翻盖手机，屏幕上显眼地显示着 AT&T 的标志。

sentence: The background consists of a smooth gradient sky transitioning from pale green to light blue.
sentence_cn: 背景由从淡绿色到浅蓝色的平滑渐变天空组成。

sentence: Above the scene, in small text, it reads: "Works in over 200 countries, like England."
sentence_cn: 场景上方用小字体写着：“在 200 多个国家有效，包括英国。”
words: Works in over 200 countries, like England.

sentence: The overall tone of the image is a blend of surrealism and modern technology, emphasizing global connectivity.
sentence_cn: 图像整体色调融合了超现实主义和现代科技，强调全球连通性。
